title: Stocks gain but will China's pledge ease trade row?
text:
Stocks gain but will China's pledge ease trade row? 8:29am EDT - 01:45 
Chinese President Xi Jinping has promised to open the country's economy further and lower import tariffs on products including cars. Markets are reacting positively to the news but as Kate King reports, the threat of a trade war with the U.S. hasn't gone away yet.
